prompt:
| Feature                | Description                              |
| ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| GitHub Storage     | All prompts & images stored in your repo |
| Infinite Scroll    | Smooth loading as you scroll             |
| 2MB Image Limit    | Validation for all uploads               |
| Image Formats Only | JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP, SVG           |
| Copy Prompt        | One-click with visual feedback           |
| Download Reference | Save reference images                    |
| AI Tool Badge      | Shows which tool was used                |
| Social Links       | Instagram, Discord, Telegram             |
| Responsive         | Works on desktop & mobile                |
| Creator Credits    | Your name & socials everywhere           |
author: Sarah
